A set of configuration parameters for a FieldLabel.

getContent

public String getContent()
Returns the content of the label. This string represents the text content of the label or HTML to be rendered in the label space depending on the value of htmlContent.

the content of the label

isHtmlContent

public boolean isHtmlContent()
Returns true if the content should be treated as HTML markup. This is set depending on whether setText(String) or setHTML(String) was last called.

Returns:
true if content should be treated as HTML markup.
